title: Bluetooth won't work for phone calls.
content: I have a new Pixel 3 XL. Bluetooth works great for everything except phone calls, and then it acts like there is no headphone hooked up. Except while I am in a call I can send music or tones to my Bluetooth. My Bluetooth works properly on my Nexus 6P. Any ideas?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
